title: Discover
text: This is the first stage where we begin to gather information about the project. By understanding customer's business industry, competitors, target audience, values, and advantages, we define a baseline for our further project direction. We love asking questions to get a deeper understanding of client's ideas and requirements.

title: Show & Tell
text: After understanding all the aspects of the project, we start sketching and wireframing the user experience and user interface. We create outline for the project with milestones and timeline. In this phase we present our vision for the project and talk through all its elements with customer. The main goal of this part of the process is to ensure a strategic plan that aligns with customer's initial vision.

title: Deliver
text: Developing a scalable and reliable web product, unique to every client, is our every day business. In this phase we carry out layout and programming processes using the latest platforms and trends in development. This is an iterative process between customer and our creative development team, with reviews and revisions on all aspects of project so we ensure the quality of the product. After this, we present customer with final version of project and upon approval, new product can be launched and promoted.

title: Sustain

We work with customer beyond project launch and make sure to stay one step ahead of the consumer, and the competition. We provide maintenance and regular updates as well as innovate and roll-out new features over time as the circumstances change.
